ew-extension.name: HorizontalMenu
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
Use Bootstrap to implement the horizontal menu bar. Developer Website: http://twitter.github.com/bootstrap/ Bootstrap is issued by Twitter under the Apache License, Version 2.0. http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
Note: Bootstrap is not part of PHPMaker. Please read "Third-Party Tools" in the help file.
